title: Added Uno Platform support
body:
**Description of Change**

Instead of waiting for WASM support in #1333, add the bit we can _now_ and add the final WASM package later.

Code pulled from:
 - https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.SkiaSharp
 - https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1333

**Bugs Fixed**

None.

**API Changes**

Added the SkiaSharp.Views.UWP APIs, but for the Uno Platform for iOS, Android and macOS.

**Behavioral Changes**

New APIs

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [x] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
